clauses_data.heading: Unstructured Content
clauses_data.text:
Master Services Agreement for the Provision of Technology Resources	

Parties: DP World FZE & Alpha Data Processing Services

December 2022

clauses_data.heading: AGREEMENT
clauses_data.text:
AGREEMENT

This Agreements is made BETWEEN

DP WORLD fze, whose Head Office is located at P.O. Box: 17000, JAFZA 17, Jebel Ali Freezone, Dubai, UAE, hereinafter (“THE CLIENT”); 

AND

ALPHA DATA PROCESSING SERVICES whose registered address is Mazaya Business Avenue, BBI Tower, 35th Floor Jumeirah Lake Towers, DUBAI, UAE, ZIP/Postal Code- 8829

hereinafter referred to (The “Agency ”);

WHEREAS THE CLIENT has the requirement of professional Technology resources on various disciplines on an interim basis to work either on site or offshore 

WHEREAS the Agency is a prequalified resource provider with the CLIENT and confirmed with the CLIENT that they shall provide the qualified and experienced Information Technology resources to work for the CLIENT on short term or long term for temporary basis as and when required in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants set forth herein and intending to be legally bound, the Parties hereto agree as follows:

clauses_data.heading: DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
The Agency will, on the request of the Client:
The Agency shall perform the Services in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement
clauses_data.text: 2.2   	The Agency shall perform the Services in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Appendices or any other Client issued authorisation or agreed by both parties.

clauses_data.heading: The Agency acknowledges and agrees that any existing agreements (which include previously agreed cha
clauses_data.text:
Clause 14.

The Agency acknowledges and agrees that any existing agreements (which include previously agreed charge structures) related to the services specified in this Agreement between the Client and Agency entered into prior to this Agreement shall be deemed null and void. This Agreement shall be the sole Agreement between the Client and the Agency for the provision of any Technology resource augmentation related services.

clauses_data.heading: The Agency shall charge the Client and the Client shall pay the Fees for the services provided by th
clauses_data.text: 4.1	The Agency shall charge the Client and the Client shall pay the Fees for the services provided by the Resource through an Engagement within the Rate Card  as specified in Appendix 1. In the event of any Resource title and cost is not specified in Appendix 1, then the Agency shall not provide any Proposal unless such title and cost is incorporated in this Agreement through a change control or contract amendment. All individual Resource Engagement Fee shall be within the Rates agreed for each roles/titles

clauses_data.heading: The Fee shall not increase from the Rates specified in the Rate Card, irrespective of the qualificat
clauses_data.text: 4.2 	The Fee shall not increase from the Rates specified in the Rate Card, irrespective of the qualification, experience and skill of the Applicants. The final and mutually agreed rates (within the rates specified in the Rate Card) will be specified in the PO for each individual Resource engagement.

clauses_data.heading: The Fee is exclusive of all taxes. Any deductions for tax, government charges, VAT are borne by the
clauses_data.text: 4.3	The Fee is exclusive of all taxes. Any deductions for tax, government charges, VAT are borne by the Client. However, banking fees and exchange rate variations etc... shall be borne by the Agency

clauses_data.heading: Agency is not entitled for any Fees for any Introduction of the Applicant without resulting in an En
clauses_data.text: 4.4	Agency is not entitled for any Fees for any Introduction of the Applicant without resulting in an Engagement.

clauses_data.text: 2.2   	The Agency shall perform the Services in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Appendices or any other Client issued authorisation or agreed by both parties.

clauses_data.heading: TERM AND SOLE AGREEMENT
clauses_data.text: This Agreement shall commence from the Effective Date and shall continue in full force and valid for Three (3) years from thereon unless terminated in accordance with
